item.title: My Mini RS Welcome Screen
item.dc:creator: @Mitko5 Mitko5
item.description:
@Mitko5 wrote:

[center]
I made this while i had no internet for 2 days and was RLY RLY bored. Since i quit private servers i decided to share this with you guys.
Preview:

Interface:

public static void welcomescreen(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intdsaddssd = addDTab(16800); intdsaddssd.anIntArray240 = new int[18]; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241 = new int[18]; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272 = new int[18]; intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[0] = 16801; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[0] = 16; //Main sprite addSprite(16801, 0, 0, "mainframe"); //Control 16802 (0) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[1] = 16802; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[1] = 282; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[1] = 101; //Label addText(16802, "30", wid, 0, 0xFFFF00); //Control 16803 (1) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[2] = 16803; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[2] = 344; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[2] = 239; //Label addText(16803, "", wid, 1, 0x000000); //Control 16804 (2) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[3] = 16804; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[3] = 387; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[3] = 113; //Label addText(16804, "a bank pin", wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16805 (3) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[4] = 16805; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[4] = 177; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[4] = 285; //Close button addCloseButton(16805, "sm_welcome1", 170, 26, "Close"); //Control 16806 (4) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[5] = 16806; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[5] = 140; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[5] = 235; //Label addText(16806, "", wid, 1, 0x000000); //Control 16807 (5) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[6] = 16807; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[6] = 152; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[6] = 218; //Label addText(16807, "Message of the week:", wid, 1, 0x800040); //Control 16808 (6) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[7] = 16808; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[7] = 140; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[7] = 253; //Label addText(16808, "", wid, 1, 0x000000); //Control 16809 (7) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[8] = 16809; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[8] = 81; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[8] = 218; //Image addSprite(16809, 0, 0, "glava"); //Control 16810 (8) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[9] = 16810; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[9] = 387; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[9] = 93; //Label addText(16810, "", wid, 1, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16811 (9) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[10] = 16811; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[10] = 348; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[10] = 220; //Label addText(16811, "You last logged in", wid, 0, 0x000000); //Control 16812 (10) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[11] = 16812; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[11] = 203; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[11] = 149; //Label addText(16812, "You have 30 membership", wid, 1, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16813 (11) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[12] = 16813; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[12] = 241; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[12] = 167; //Label addText(16813, "days left.", wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16814 (12) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[13] = 16814; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[13] = 391; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[13] = 156; //Label addText(16814, "Req Q:", wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16815 (13) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[14] = 16815; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[14] = 388; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[14] = 173; //Label addText(16815, "13.10.09", wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16816 (14) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[15] = 16816; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[15] = 83; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[15] = 160; //Label addText(16816, "no messages", wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16817 (15) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[16] = 16817; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[16] = 68; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[16] = 123; //Label addText(16817, "0 unread messages", wid, 0, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 16818 (16) intdsaddssd.anIntArray240[17] = 16818; intdsaddssd.anIntArray241[17] = 138; intdsaddssd.anIntArray272[17] = 100; //Label addText(16818, "0", wid, 0, 0xFFFF00); //Added 17 controls. }This goes in class9.java btw.

Under aClass44 = class44;
Add

welcomescreen(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);

Make a folder called Files and then make another one inside it called interface and then put these sprites in there:
http://uppit.com/v/FVVC05YR

Some methods you may need if you get errors:

[code] private static Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 loadAscheriitSprite(int i, String s)
{
long l = (Class50.method585((byte)1, s) << 8) + (long)i;
Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1)aClass12_238.method222(l);
if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 != null)
return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
try
{
class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1((new StringBuilder()).append("./Files/interface/").append(s).append(" “).append(i).append(”.png").toString());
aClass12_238.method223(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1, l, (byte)2);
}
catch(Exception exception)
{
return null;
}
return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
}

private static Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 CustomSpriteLoader(int i, String s)
{
long l = (Class50.method585((byte)1, s) << 8) + (long)i;
Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1)aClass12_238.method222(l);
if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 != null) {
return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
}
try {
class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("./Files/interface/"+s+" “+i+”.png");
aClass12_238.method223(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1, l, (byte)2);
} catch(Exception exception) {
return null;
}
return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
}[/code]

[size=15pt]Server Side:[/size]
TextHandler:

//*/ Welcome Screen /*/ c.sendQuest("from: "+c.playerLastConnect+".",16803); c.sendQuest("Always use a spoon", 16806); c.sendQuest("when eating shit.", 16808); if(c.bankPin == 1){ c.sendQuest("You have", 16810); } if(c.bankPin == 0){ c.sendQuest("You don't have", 16810); } /*/ Krai ot Welcome Screen/*/

ClickingMost.java:

case 65165: c.closeAll(); break;

Credits go to:
JaGeX - The sprites for the interface
Lin - for using his interface maker
Me - for making it

P.S. This is not finished because the project file got damaged for some reason and interface maker freezes when trying to edit it, a few of my friends tried to edit it too but didn’t work out.[/center]
